title.narrative: Sverige-Ukraina Partnerskap för en Modern och Effektiv Skattemyndighet - METS
Swedish-Ukrainian Partnership for Modern and Efficient Tax Service – METS

description.narrative: The overall objective for the project is to improve the tax administration capacity and contribute to a transformation of the STS into a more modern, trustworthy, effective and service-oriented tax administration. The overall impacts pursued by the project will be:- increase in the level of tax revenues;- improvement of working environment and conditions;- ensuring the principles of efficiency, equity, fairness and integrity in the service of taxpayers;- strengthen the development of HR services;- modern leaders as role models with value founding and sustainable leadership;- employees with responsibility and capability of self-development. Component 1, Leadership and Co-workership: Target: A corporate culture supporting the understanding of the mission & vision of STS in order to increase both individual and corporate motivation for transition to the new STS. Outcome: Improved tax administration capacity and contribution to a transformation of the STS into a more modern, trustworthy, effective and service-oriented tax administration. Component 2, Taxpayer Oriented Approach: Target: More taxpayer oriented communication and services (digital and others). Outcome: Services and other interaction meet taxpayer needs and strengthen trust for STS.

tag.narrative: 16.6 - Bygga upp effektiva och transparenta institutioner med ansvarsutkrävande på alla nivåer.
16.6 - Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative:
STA and STS are constantly having a dialogue on what specific activities should be implemented under the defined areas. The work of a project to a large extent takes place in a form of a physical or online STA short-term experts missions.
The narrative report 2020 presents a description of 5 digital mission to STS held during 2020; missions 1-3 related to Component 1 and missions 1,2,4,5 - to Component 2. The missions' objectives are described mostly as introductory activities like presentation of participants, getting to know each other, presentation of METS project, getting a common understanding of the cooperation following the project proposal and MoU between STA and STS. The content parts were related to the discussions on STS Taxpayer's Survey and a customer service STA experience and STS presentation.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
